Robert,

I would like to provide such a mechanism, but I'm not sure what it should
look like. We have internally discussed changing the Runner protocol from:
  run(Class... testClasses)

To:
  run(TestProvider... Providers)

Where there would initially just be a TestClassProvider. Would this help
you? Do you have an example of the kind of behavior you would like to see?

Sincerely yours,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute

> -----Original Message-----
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On

> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4 RFE: ignoring a test at runtime
> 
> I've got a more general request that solves this one as well... can we
> make sure that the annotations are only used as a source of
> configuration data for a programmable API? This would mean we can
> change the configuration mechanism as needed.
